campaign.story:
The Castle Panic Deluxe Collection is an upgraded version of Castle Panic and all of its expansions, including a brand new expansion, Crowns and Quests. This collection still features the same great mechanics you've loved for over 10 years, now in a special, limited edition that includes all-new art, plastic pieces for the Castle, plastic Monster minis that feature a unique spinning base to track damage, wooden Monster tokens, promo items and more!
In The Wizard's Tower, a friendly wizard has joined the battle, giving you access to powerful magic spells. The Monsters return stronger, faster, and smarter. Magical Imps, evasive flying creatures, and 6 Mega Boss Monsters now threaten your towers. Attack the monsters with fire but keep the castle from burning as well.
Face the most powerful enemy yet in The Dark Titan, Agranok and his army lay siege to the castle. The Dark Sorceress, Elite Monsters, and the Boom Troll press the attack. Use the Cavalier, Boiling Oil, and Support Tokens to survive new levels of panic.
Use the Engineer and new Resource cards in Engines of War and work together to build new weapons such as Catapults, Ballistas, Barricades, and more. Defend the castle from new threats like the Siege Tower, War Wagon, and Battering Ram, as well as the Shaman, Breathtaker, and Goblin Saboteurs.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risks and challenges
Fireside Games has been publishing and distributing games around the world for over 10 years. During that time, we have worked with multiple factories and international freight companies to ensure our high-quality games are delivered on-time and in excellent condition. For this Kickstarter, we are working with experienced partners like Quartermaster Logistics to continue that pattern of quality.

We are estimating a May 2022 delivery date for this game, but please keep in mind this is only an estimate. There are always elements beyond our control when working with manufacturers, such as virus outbreaks, production delays, shipping delays, and delays with customs. Should these occur, we will make sure that we quickly communicate any delay or challenge and keep our backers updated.

In addition, the game has already gone through substantial production, which further limits the chances for delays. The artwork is mostly complete, the plastics have been sculpted, and many components are at or near a print-ready state. The final layout, proofing, and editing still need to be done, but we are confident in our timing estimates.

Thank you for your support!

Learn more about Fireside Games at www.firesidegames.com
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Here's a quick guide to all of our major updates since this Kickstarter began:
 MAY 7: 103% funded! NEW Final Goal: $6.3M and 2 NEW HOLIDAY SPECIALS!
MAY 7: $5.5M GOAL REACHED! 12 EPS and 12 NEW SHORTS!
 MAY 6: 89% funded. New Reward: Premiere Screening & Afterparty!
 MAY 5: 83% funded. New RiffTrax Rewards! Snowglobe + Mission Patches!
 MAY 4: $4.4M GOAL REACHED! 9 EPS and 2x GIZMOPLEX EVENTS! 
 MAY 4: 79% funded. T-Shirt and Poster Designs. Bonus Challenges 7 & 8!
 MAY 3: 75% funded. All About the Gizmoplex! Bonus Challenge 6!
 MAY 2: 71% funded. 3D movie + glasses unlocked! Bonus Challenge 5!
 APR 30: Joel clarifies remote production plans + new LIVE set visit reward!
 APR 29: Bonus Challenges 3 + 4: 3D Movies, New Rewards & More!
 APR 27: A Week of Livestreams: 5 Movies, 1 Jackbox Game Night & Final Telethon!
 APR 23: $3.3M GOAL REACHED! 6 EPS and GIZMOPLEX APPS! 
 APR 22:  Production Plans, Multiple Hosts and... The Return of Joel Robinson?! 
 APR 21:  Sticker Rewards DOUBLED! Livestream on 4/26.
 APR 20:  More About the GIZMOPLEX APPS! 
 APR 16:  Challenges 1-2 and How to Unlock Bonus Rewards
 APR 13:  More About Reward Levels & Add-On Rewards
 APR 9:  Joel Answers Some FAQs
 APR 8: $2.0M GOAL REACHED! 3 EPS and THE GIZMOPLEX! 
Not sure what's included in each reward level? We've got you covered: here's a chart showing all of the rewards and bonus rewards that come with each pledge package!

 Missed a live event? Rewatch here:
 Livestream 1: HOBGOBLINS w/ the MST3K LIVE TOUR CAST!
 Livestream 2: UNTAMED YOUTHw/ special guest J. ELVIS WEINSTEIN!
 Livestream 3: QUEST OF THE DELTA KNIGHTSw/ special guest MARY JO PEHL!
 Livestream 4: GAMERA vs GUIRON w/ Jonah, Hampton, Nate & Conor! 
 Live Special: JACKBOX SHOWDOWN w/ Team Jonah vs. Team Emily!
 Livestream 5: WEREWOLFw/ special guest BILL CORBETT!
 Livestream 6: ZOMBIE NIGHTMARE w/ surprise guest FRANK DIETZ!
Welcome back, everyone.
Joel Hodgson here. Before we get started, I know it's been a really long, strange, difficult 12 months for a lot of us, so I hope everyone is doing okay and staying safe.
So... where were we?
In the not-too-distant past – about 6 years ago, November 2015 AD – we ran a Kickstarter to BRING BACK MST3K after 15 years in hibernation.
It was a little bit stressful, and a lot of work, but I've gotta tell you... the whole experience went better than we had ever hoped:
Thanks to you, our campaign broke a bunch of Kickstarter records.
Over 48,000 of you took up the cause... and together, we raised over $6 million.
With your help, we got picked up on Netflix and made 20 new episodes!
And you know, you can't ever please everybody, but it seems like most of you were pretty happy with 'em.... and the critics were too: 
Also, having those new episodes on Netflix, along with a lot of our "classic" episodes, helped a lot of folks discover Mystery Science Theater for the first time. So, if you weren't there to help #BringBackMST3K... Welcome! We're glad you're here to help  #MakeMoreMST3K.
Thanks to our Kickstarter, we also built up enough momentum to experiment with taking MST3K in new directions, including three live national tours, where we got to meet thousands of you in person!  Also, during our live tours, it became really clear to me that MST3K works best when you can experience it together, with your family and friends, or your fellow MSTies.
Anyway: as you know, nothing good lasts forever.  Sometime in late 2019, during our third live tour, we got word: even though Netflix liked how our new episodes came out, they wouldn't be renewing us for a third new season.
(Sometimes, business is just business, you know? Was it disappointing not to get renewed? Well, sure. But starting now, we want to focus on looking forward, not back. And when you see what we're planning now, I hope you'll agree that this could end up being the best thing for MST3K in the long run.)
Then, the day after we finished the live tour, the whole world shut down for a year. And you know, as terrible as COVID has been, it did mean that I had plenty of time to think about where Mystery Science Theater can go next.
When I thought about it long enough, I realized three important things:
 1. The world isn't done with MST3K yet.
 We still want to make more episodes of MST3K.
A lot of you still want us to make more MST3K.
2. It's time to try something new.
If enough of you want more MST3K, maybe we don't need anyone to renew us.
From now on, we want you to decide how long MST3K keeps going.
We don't need a network to "let us" make more MST3K. We can make it for you. 
When we do, you should be the first ones to see it.
3. We need a better space for sharing MST3K, and watching it together.
Without a network, we'll need a home for new MST3K, and...
We want it to be easy to enjoy MST3K live with other people, so...
We need our own online theater for live screenings and events! 
I'm glad you asked, friend... because that's what this new Kickstarter is all about.
Thanks to all of you, Mystery Science Theater 3000 has come a long way since our first Kickstarter.  Now, if you decide to get involved again, here's what we can do next:
1. MAKE MORE MST3K episodes with a new, sustainable model, that lets you decide how long we should keep going, and lets us bring new episodes directly to you, without depending on a network to distribute or keep renewing us for new seasons.
2. BUILD THE GIZMOPLEX, our own virtual online theater, where we can host frequent live screenings, premieres, and community events – and you can host MST3K watch parties with friends whenever you want. More on that in a minute. 
Man... you're way ahead of me. 
If you were part of our first Kickstarter, this next part might sound familiar:
 If our new Kickstarter can raise at least $2,000,000, we'll be able to make three more new episodes of Mystery Science Theater 3000...but we'll also have enough to build the Gizmoplex. 
And then – just like last time – the more we raise, the more we can do! Here's what we'll be able to do at each of our goals, all the way up to our final goal of $5.5 million: 
UPDATE (5/8): We hit $6.4M, which means JOEL ROBINSON will return to HOST 2 NEW EPISODES and we'll add a 13TH NEW EPISODE!
Also, you know, we don't want to get ahead of ourselves, but if things go well, we've got a lot of other ideas we'd like to add into the mix. You can find out more about that below, and also in this Backer Update.
Now listen, I hope you're already convinced that the best reason to join our new Kickstarter is because we'll able to #MakeMoreMST3K and #BuildTheGizmoplex.
But since this is Kickstarter, let's talk about REWARDS.
I'm really proud of how most of the rewards from our first Kickstarter campaign turned out, and ever since then, a lot of you told me how much you loved them too. So, this time around, I want to do our best to "raise the bar." You'll have to decide for yourself if we pull it off, but I'll tell you that we've got a few rewards this time that I'm really excited about – especially the Gizmoplex DIY Concession Pack, our new Challenge Coins, and a pretty amazing design for an MST3K Musical Snow Globe! 
UPDATE – Since there are so many rewards to keep track of, and we want to make sure you know what to expect in each pledge level, we've also put together this chart, which has been UPDATED to include the ALL-DIGITAL EXPERIMENT 85! 
So yeah, as you can see, until you get above Experiment 500, most of the rewards "stack", which means you get all of the rewards listed in all of the lower pledge levels,  not just the new rewards listed with each pledge level. And unless it says otherwise, all reward levels above Experiment 500 include everything listed on this chart. I'm telling you, it's a lot of cool stuff. 
UPDATE (MAY 5): Joel has shared some "sneak peek" images of the designs for our new rewards, including TWO T-SHIRT DESIGNS, TWO POSTER DESIGNS, the MUSICAL SNOWGLOBE and the just-released MISSION PATCHES!
 FIRST LOOK: T-SHIRT DESIGNS 
FIRST LOOK: POSTER DESIGNS 
FIRST LOOK: MUSICAL SNOWGLOBE 
You can read more about the Musical Snowglobe in this Backer Update, but you should know that it will have a "wind-up" mechanical element in the base which plays a new rendition of the MST3K Theme Song, composed just for this reward by Paul Sabourin:
FIRST LOOK: NEW MISSION PATCH (ADD-ON) 
Also, one big change since last time is that we're now able to offer "Add-On Rewards" right here on Kickstarter. That means that we don't have to guess exactly what you'll like, or create a million different confusing pledge levels. 
Here are some of the Add-On Rewards available right now:

 SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED!
Also, just in case you missed the notice in the description of each reward level: We're not collecting shipping costs for any rewards until after the Kickstarter ends.
About 2-4 weeks after our Kickstarter campaign ends, you'll get a reward survey to give us all of the details we need, like your t-shirt size, or the name(s) you want us to use for each of the "Special Thanks" rewards. When you give us those details, we'll also collect shipping for any rewards that go in the mail!
REWARD TIMING
While a handful of rewards – like the "MST3K Season 13: Collector's Box Set" on DVD and Blu-Ray – might not be available until as late as June 2022, other rewards – like Weekly Production Updates – will start within just a few weeks of when our Kickstarter campaign ends. So, don't let the "June 2022" delivery date scare you. Kickstarter just asks us to list the latest date when we expect all rewards to be sent out.
Now, I know this is already a lot of information, especially if you already watched our video, and I think I've told you most of the really important stuff.
And, if you still want more information, there's a lot more detail below, so keep reading if you want to know more about...
How the Gizmoplex will work!
How the Gizmoplex can make MST3K better! 
How we set our funding goals!
How we'll spend whatever we raise!
Also, one of the things I like best about Kickstarter is that it's not just a "monologue," but a really great way to have a conversation with all of you who care about the show. So, if there are other things you want to know about, I hope you'll take a look at our FAQ... and if the answer isn't there, I hope you'll ask!
We'll also do our best to read and respond to all of your comments. But just so you know, I'm pretty sure that our first Kickstarter also got more comments than any project that came before it! So, if that happens again, please be patient if it takes us a little while to get to everything. We've got a whole month, and a lot more to tell you!
There's one more thing I need to say before you go, and it's pretty important:
Over the last year, as I was trying to imagine where Mystery Science Theater can go next, I also spent a lot of time thinking about how we got here.
(It's kind of crazy to realize that it's been almost six years since our first Kickstarter, and almost thirty-three years since we first aired on KTMA on Thanksgiving in 1988.)
Anyway, when I look back on everything that's happened, it's really clear that our first Kickstarter was one of the defining moments in Mystery Science history. For our first campaign, we asked you to help us make new episodes, and to prove to "the networks" that there was still an audience for MST3K... and you did!
But together, we've done a lot more than that. Thanks to you, Mystery Science Theater has been able to produce 2 new seasons, 20 new episodes, 6 comic books, 3 live national tours, and 1 record-breaking Kickstarter.
Today, I hope you'll join us again to write MST3K's next chapter: to prove that we can #MakeMoreMST3K without depending on a network to keep us alive, and to #BuildTheGizmoplex, a unique online theater where MST3K can continue to grow.
But – and this is the important part – I also want to be cautious. We're all just crawling out from COVID, and it's been a difficult year. I know that things are more difficult for a lot of people than they were during our first Kickstarter. If you decide to pledge, please: only give what feels comfortable, even if it's just a few bucks. And if you can't afford anything, that's okay too! We'll find other ways for you to stay involved, and to make sure you can still get access to all of our new episodes and Gizmoplex events.
That's all: more than anything, please just take care of yourself... and if you can't help out right now, don't think twice about it. We'll still be here when you're ready.
I guess that's everything, so... we've got 30 days. Let's see how this thing goes.
Cheers & Thanks,
Joel


Hey, you're still here. So, I guess you want more details, huh?
Oh yeah, that's right. Thanks for reminding me.
I think the Gizmoplex might be the biggest "new idea" we're working with this time around, so there are a lot of details and possibilities I'm excited to share with you as we go. Here's what you should know right away.
Having a Gizmoplex All-Access Pass has three important benefits:
1. Live Premieres & Events: The Gizmoplex will host at least TWO LIVE EVENTS EVERY MONTH for our first year, where you can join me, our cast and writers, and some special surprise guests. Each event will be like a night at the theater, and will have a lot of fun surprises. Some of our ideas include theme nights hosted by our cast and special guests, live commentaries, and maybe even live riffing! Also, we won't just screen episodes: it'll be a real show, and could include new sketches, trailers (done "MST3K style"), live Q&A panel discussions, interviews, contests... and the return of the MST3K "viewer mail" segment! (And yes, if you can't make one, you'll be able to see it after.)
2. The MST3K Watch Club: To make it easier to watch MST3K with your friends, the Gizmoplex will also be the official home of the MST3K Watch Club! Each month, you'll get on-demand access to a new selection of episodes, and the ability to host your own live screenings for up to 10 people! Anyone with a Gizmoplex Pass can join for free, and if you want to invite someone who doesn't, they can get a "Day Pass" for just $0.99!
3. Gizmoplex Apps: Since we reached our second goal ($3.3M) we'll be able to develop apps that bring the Gizmoplex to mobile devices and TVs! Right now, the plan is to include apps for six of the most popular platforms: iOS, Android, AppleTV, AndroidTV, FireTV and Roku. And no promises, but we're also looking into apps for XBOX, PlayStation and Samsung TVs. Like Crow says: we're gonna conquer cyberspace, man! (Read more about the apps here.)
So, if you think about it, we think it's a pretty different model than we could pull off anywhere else. I really want the Gizmoplex to feel like something new: less like another Netflix with nothing but MST, and more like a charming, off the radar, suburban cineplex that plays movies for 99 cents, long after their first run.
If we get this right, the Gizmoplex Pass won't just give you a monthly subscription to a catalog of MST3K episodes, or a place to watch the episodes you own on-demand: it'll be more like a "Season Pass" that gives you tickets to every show at your favorite theater: front row, opening night, every time. Take that, Moviepass!
You can read a LOT more about our plans for the Gizmoplex in this Backer Update.
Also, even though this won't make a lot of sense until I give you more details, there's one more thing I want you to understand:
The Gizmoplex won't just be our new online theater and event space. It's also going to be an important new location that The Mads are creating on the show, and inside the world of Mystery Science Theater, as their next step toward world domination: the first cineplex on the moon!
Anyway, I think it'll all make sense when you see it... but until then, remember, “It’s just a show, I should really just relax.”
So, there you have it: in a nutshell, this is what we want to do. After 33 years, it's time for Mystery Science "Theater" to have an actual (virtual) theater that MSTies can call their own. It's time... to #BuildTheGizmoplex.
Any other questions?
Oh, wait. I think I know what you're going to ask. 
Just like last time, I'm sure some of you are wondering, so go ahead and ask. 
I knew that's what you were gonna ask! And since we're asking you to pledge some of your hard-earned money – especially after a difficult year – I want to be really open and transparent about this. So, let's break this down a little bit.
1. Without a network supporting us, we need to fund everything ourselves. During our first Kickstarter, we estimated that, once production was up and running, we'd be able to produce new episodes for about $250K each. In the end, though, the budget for each new episode ended up being closer to $350K. For the last two seasons, we were able to cover the difference through our deal with Netflix... but this time, we're on our own. We've got a lot of ways we can keep the budget lower, but, you know... it's still going to cost something. And when you think about it, $350K for 90 minutes of television is still one of the best deals in show business.
2. We still can't spend everything we raise on Kickstarter to make the show.
Campaign Fees: Between Kickstarter and the credit card processor, we pay about 8% of your pledge in fees. There's also a fee for CrowdOx, the platform we'll use to manage all of your surveys and rewards after the campaign ends.
Making Rewards: We reserve about 20% of your pledge in order to design, produce, print, sort and pack all of your rewards. And that's not even including shipping, which we're not collecting until after our Kickstarter campaign ends!
Dedicated Support: During our first Kickstarter, we underestimated the amount of work involved in providing customer support and creating detailed backer updates, so we had to depend on volunteers to do a lot of it. This time, we want to make sure we're prepared, so we budgeted about 4% of each pledge for that.
Building & Running the Gizmoplex: We really want the Gizmoplex to be great, but getting it started will take some work – and keeping it running also means we'll have some monthly fees to cover. We also need some budget to support all of the special live events we're planning to host. So, we're using about 3% of your pledge for that.
When you put it all together, we have to spend about 35% of what we raise just to cover Kickstarter expenses, and to keep all the promises we're making to you.

3. The more episodes we make, the less each one costs! Like we explained during our first Kickstarter, the basic idea is pretty simple: for some parts of production, we have to spend the same amount up front, no matter how many episodes we're making.
For example, let's say that our writers realize the show needs a custom-built oversized rubber chicken. No matter how many episodes we have, it's going to cost $1000 to make. So, if we only use it in three episodes, we have to spend $333 per episode on a rubber chicken. But, if we use the chicken in twelve episodes, that $1000 goes a lot farther, and our rubber chicken kaiju only costs us $83 for each episode. Make sense?
     Based on those numbers, you can see that the cost for each episode gets lower as the number of episodes goes up:
So yeah, just like our first Kickstarter, I know that a fair number of you won't care about these types of details... but since some of you will, we want to be as clear as possible.
1. KEEP CIRCULATING THE URL. Back in the day, MST3K wasn’t seen nationwide and we encouraged people to record the shows on VHS and send them to their friends and loved ones. It was our version of “I Want My MTV.” Every episode of MST3K ended with a message that encouraged MSTies to “Keep Circulating the Tapes,” and you guys did. Then, in our last Kickstarter, we updated that to "Keep Circulating the URL," and you did that too. Now, we've got a new URL, so we're asking you again:
2. FOLLOW @MST3K ON SOCIAL MEDIA. Be sure you're following our account on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and YouTube. Those are one of our best ways to keep everyone up-to-date on what's going on, so encourage your fellow MSTies to follow them too! We really appreciate it, and we couldn’t do it without you. You’re like our virtual street team!
3. CIRCULATE THE MESSAGE FROM EACH UPDATE. From now until our Kickstarter ends on May 7, most of the backer updates that we send will include a suggested message or image. Copy, paste, and post them on your own social accounts to help spread the word. It's as simple as that! 
4. CHECK IN WITH YOUR FELLOW MSTIES.  We don't want you to pressure anyone, but we do hope you'll check in to make sure they know about this Kickstarter.  And when you do, be sure to remind them that pledging even a $1 token pledge will still help us unlock more Challenge Goals, Bonus Rewards, and get them weekly updates all the way through the production of Season 13!
5. JOIN OUR "VIRTUAL STREET TEAM." If you've got a little extra time, and want to make sure we reach our final goal, there are more specific ways to volunteer and help. If you want to get specific "assignments" to help us #MakeMoreMST3K, you can sign up to be part of our elite volunteer team.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As we learned last time, there are always risks with Kickstarter... and the world is a little crazier right now than usual. Here are a few that we've considered:

• After a difficult economic year, this might not be a good time for some people to offer financial support to a robot puppet show dedicated to cheesy movies.

• COVID is a huge unknown, and could still impact all sorts of things, from our production schedule and approach, to our timeframe for producing and delivering your rewards.

• Another ship could block the Suez Canal, trapping your challenge coins and snow globes for weeks, months, or years. But also, what are the odds it'll happen twice in one year?

• Building the Gizmoplex is a big undertaking, and we'll be depending on a few tech partners to make specific parts of the experience possible. So, if one of our partners ran into problems, there's always a risk of that affecting the Gizmoplex.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: JUST HELPING OUT
support.descp:
Just here to help us boost our final counts? Sent by one of our friends? Don't care about getting a giant package of rewards or downloads? That's fine: We don't need a large pledge... we just need YOU!
At this level, you'll still be able to select Add-On Rewards and special "Last Minute Offers" from our friends + cast! Plus, you'll be able to increase your pledge AFTER the campaign if you want to upgrade to a higher-level reward package!
INCLUDES:
Weekly Production Updates
Access to "Add-On Rewards"

support.title: EXPERIMENT 15
support.descp:
Just want to be part of the experience?
Jump on board and get exclusive WEEKLY UPDATES AND PRODUCTION DIARIES all the way through production of Season 13. You'll also get a printable Gizmoplex "Founders" Certificate and ID Card, to prove you helped #BuildTheGizmoplex.
Plus, we'll even ADD YOUR NAME on a virtual wall of The Gizmoplex, in the private Backers' Lounge where Tom Servo tends bar!
INCLUDES:
Weekly Production Updates
Gizmoplex Founders' Packet (PDF)
Special Thanks in the Gizmoplex

support.title: EXPERIMENT 35
support.descp:
Get a first look at the future of MST3K with a 3 MONTH Gizmoplex Pass: your ticket to LIVE ONLINE PREMIERES of our next 3 new episodes, 24/7 watch parties, and much more! Plus, we'll sing your praises on social media AND add you to the "nice list" for this year's MST3K Holiday Card!
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
Gizmoplex Pass: 3 Months
A Holiday Card from MST3K
Special Thanks on Social Media

support.title: EXPERIMENT 50
support.descp:
Make your Season 13 experience last even longer: upgrade to a 6-MONTH GIZMOPLEX PASS and you'll be set for half a year of live events – including the premiere events for up to 6 new episodes!
Plus, get a super-collectible GIZMOPLEX STICKER and our COVID-safe MST3K@Home Kit, with digital backgrounds and avatars for all of your video chat needs.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
Gizmoplex Pass: 6 Months Total
The Gizmoplex Sticker
Download: MST3K@Home Kit

support.title: EXPERIMENT 75
support.descp:
Snacks are ALWAYS free at The Gizmoplex... as long as you make them yourself! But when you do, you'll want our GIZMOPLEX DIY CONCESSION PACK – our official and reusable POPCORN BUCKET and DRINK CUP – to put them in.
And you'll have even MORE time to use them, because we'll upgrade you to a 9-MONTH GIZMOPLEX PASS!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
The Gizmoplex DIY Concession Pack
Gizmoplex Pass: 9 Months Total
Download: MST3K Soundtrack, Vol 2

support.title: EXPERIMENT 85: ALL DIGITAL**
support.descp:
STANDALONE PLEDGE PACKAGE
(This pledge level is not included in higher levels as part of the "All rewards above...")
Want to make sure you'll get ALL of the DIGITAL REWARDS from this campaign, but without ANY of the PHYSICAL REWARDS and absolutely NO SHIPPING COSTS?
Well, this is the reward level for you! You'll get DOWNLOADS OF EVERY NEW EPISODE in Season 13, available to stream in the Gizmoplex AND to download in glorious HD with no insulting DRM. Plus, you'll get all of the digital rewards included in every reward level up through Experiment 150, along with any digital BONUS REWARDS unlocked during the campaign challenges.
*PLEASE NOTE: This level does NOT include the "Special Thanks in End Credits" reward. To be listed in the credits, grab Experiment 150 or higher... or get the credit as an Add-On Reward.
*If you want to upgrade to get all TEN CLASSIC EPISODE DOWNLOADS, just select the "CLASSIC EPISODE UPGRADE" Add-On Reward for $30 more.
INCLUDES:
Download: MST3K, Season 13
Gizmoplex Pass: 12 Months
Download: 5 Classic Episodes
Download: MST3K Soundtrack, Vol 2
Download: MST3K@Home Kit
Special Thanks on Social Media
Special Thanks in the Gizmoplex
Gizmoplex Founders' Packet (PDF)
Weekly Production Updates

support.title: EXPERIMENT 100
support.descp:
If your #BringBackMST3K t-shirt is getting a little threadbare, maybe it's time for something new? Get the official SEASON 13 T-SHIRT, and you'll once again be the envy of those elitists on the catwalks of Milan.
Plus, with a 12 MONTH Gizmoplex Pass, your social calendar is set for the next year. (Get behind me, COVID!)
You'll also get a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD of every new episode we make, AND we'll add them to your private collection at The Gizmoplex for 24/7/365 streaming and watch parties.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
The Season 13 T-Shirt
Gizmoplex Pass: 12 Months
Download: MST3K, Season 13

support.title: EXPERIMENT 150: THE POSTER
support.descp:
If you've been stuck at home for a year, you might be tired of staring at those same old walls... so why not fancy up the place with the OFFICIAL SEASON 13 POSTER?
Then, once it's hanging, feel free to ignore it and watch your MST3K CLASSIC BACKER PACK: five classic, fan-favorite episodes of MST3K, hand-selected by Joel.
Plus, be sure to make your friends watch the new season, so that you can point out YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS of a new episode!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
The Season 13 Poster
Download: 5 Classic Episodes
Special Thanks in End Credits (1 ep)

support.title: EXPERIMENT 250
support.descp:
Sure, you'll be able to stream and download Season 13 through The Gizmoplex. But... what happens if the internet disappears!? Don't risk being caught without our new episodes: reserve your MST3K SEASON 13 COLLECTOR'S BOX SET, on your choice of charmingly dated DVD or Blu-Ray.
You'll also score the #MakeMoreMST3K CHALLENGE COIN "BACKER" EDITION. It's the perfect evidence for proving to your great-grandchildren that, way back in 2021, you were a founding supporter of The Gizmoplex: the first cineplex on the moon!
And, while you're waiting for the new episodes to arrive, relive even *more* classics with the MST3K CLASSIC DELUXE PACK: a total of TEN fan-favorite episodes of MST3K, hand-selected by Joel, and yours to stream and download!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
The Season 13 Box Set (DVD/BD)
The MST3K Challenge Coin: Backer
Download: 10 Classic Episodes

support.title: EXPERIMENT 350
support.descp:
You'll never forget that you helped #MakeMoreMST3K with the ultimate collectible keepsake: our ultra limited edition MST3K SNOW GLOBE & MUSIC BOX! Each one will be hand-painted, hand-numbered, and ready to enchant you with its gentle rendition of the MST3K love theme.
Plus, we'll upgrade you to the MST3K CHALLENGE COIN: DELUXE EDITION, with a different design and metallic finish. Take THAT, great-grandkids! This is what I did with your inheritance!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
The MST3K Snow Globe + Music Box
Challenge Coin: Deluxe (upgrade)

support.title: EXPERIMENT 400
support.descp:
Always wanted to see MST3K getting made, but can't break the bank or risk traveling before the pandemic is behind us? Have we got a deal for you: an invitation to our VIRTUAL SET VISIT, where you'll be able to spend a day watching our remote-production feeds live from the comfort of your own home, along with live Q&A sessions with members of our cast and crew.
And, to commemorate the experience, we'll upgrade your MST3K CHALLENGE COIN to the SET WATCHER EDITION, with a unique design and metallic finish that you'll treasure for years to come. (Or until you lose it.)
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
Virtual Set Visit: Set Watcher
Challenge Coin: Set Watcher (upgrade)

support.title: EXPERIMENT 500
support.descp:
So, you want to do more than just watch? Upgrade to VIRTUAL SET VISIT VIP ACCESS, and you'll get a chance to PARTICIPATE in the live Q&A sessions and INTERACT with our cast and crew, all from the (relative) safety of your own home!
And, so your friends know who they're dealing with, we'll upgrade your MST3K CHALLENGE COIN to the top-of-the-line VIP EDITION, with a unique design, finish and numbering!
Plus, we'll heap even MORE praise on you: You'll get SPECIAL THANKS in the END CREDITS OF THREE EPISODES *and* we'll read out your name to THANK YOU DURING A GIZMOPLEX LIVE EVENT!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards listed above, plus...
Virtual Set Visit: VIP Access
Challenge Coin: VIP (upgrade)
Special Thanks in End Credits (3 eps)
Special Thanks During Live Event

support.title: "I PREFER THE ORIGINALS."
support.descp:
Don't care about the "new" MST3K? Prefer to relive your youth – or someone else's – with the classic Joel and Mike episodes? We've got just the thing!
You'll get DIGITAL DOWNLOADS of over 150 CLASSIC EPISODES & SHORTS from our first 10 seasons, and access to stream all of them 24/7 through our Gizmoplex website and apps. You'll also get a free month of RiffTrax Friends, 4 free RiffTrax downloads, and virtual tickets to a live RiffTrax event in the Gizmoplex. Push the button, Frank!
INCLUDES:
Ultimate Digital Collection (130 Episodes)
Download: 10 Classic Episodes
Gizmoplex Pass: 3 Months
Special Thanks in the Gizmoplex
Weekly Production Updates

support.title: PERSONAL VIDEO FROM A BOT
support.descp:
So, you want a personalized video message, and the human celebrities on Cameo aren't cutting it? No problem! Get a CUSTOM VIDEO FROM A BOT, and let Crow, Servo, GPC, Waverly or Growler do the talking for you!
The bot of your choice will record a custom, non-commercial 45-second video based on your request.* It can't include special props or costumes, but you will be able to choose from several MST3K locations.
*See the FAQ for more details!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Personal Bot Video (45 sec)

support.title: PERSONAL VIDEO from the S.O.L.
support.descp:
Looking for an even MORE elite personalized video? How about this? We'll record a PERSONAL VIDEO FROM THE SATELLITE OF LOVE, shot just like our Season 13 host segments!
The host and bots of your choice will record a custom, non-commercial 60 second video based on your request.* We can't include special props or costumes, but you WILL be able to choose from a few MST3K locations!
*See the FAQ for more details.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Personal SOL Video (60 sec)

support.title: PRIVATE MEET & GREET (ONLINE)
support.descp:
Want a more interactive video experience? Put those Zoom skills you've been developing all year to the test with a PRIVATE ONLINE MEET & GREET from the Satellite of Love.
Our human test subject and 2 bots of your choice will join you for a 10-minute Zoom conversation about cheesy movies, surviving quarantine, or anything else you feel like discussing.*
Plus, after your chat is over, we'll send you a HIGH-RES VIDEO of your conversation and an AUTOGRAPHED SCREENSHOT. All the perks of your favorite fan convention, from the comfort of your own home!
*See the FAQ for more details.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Private Zoom w/ Host & Bots (10 min)
Autographed Screenshot

support.title: GET INVENTIVE WITH JOEL
support.descp:
Do you ever watch MST3K and think, "What kind of idiot comes up with these inventions?" Well, now YOU can be that idiot, when you join Joel to BRAINSTORM AN INVENTION that will appear in a new episode of MST3K – and when shooting ends, you'll get to KEEP A FEATURED INVENTION!
Get started when you join Joel for an online INTRO TO INVENTIONS & MAGIC class, where he'll explain his unique method for concepting and designing inventions, and explain how stage magic and sleight-of-hand can inspire new ideas. Then, join Joel and a small group online for an INVENTION EXCHANGE WORKSHOP, where you'll get to add invention ideas and give feedback.
Plus, you'll be listed as "Gizmonic Institute R&D" in the credits of the episode where your group's invention appears!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Keep an Invention from Season 13
Online Class: Intro to Inventions & Magic
Online Workshop: Invention Exchange
Episode Credit as "Gizmonic R&D"

support.title: VOICE ACT WITH M. WAVERLY
support.descp:
One of the breakout stars of MST3K: The Return, M. Waverly has inexplicably captured the hearts of MSTies everywhere. And now, for the first – and possibly only – time, you can literally put words in his mouth when you PERFORM A LINE AS WAVERLY in a new episode... all without leaving your home!
To prepare for your big voice-acting debut, you'll attend Joel's online INTRO TO ROBOT PUPPETEERING class, where you'll learn the secrets of memorable puppeteering from the pros who operate our bots on screen.
We'll also set up a PRIVATE ONLINE REHEARSAL with Joel and the show’s director, to make sure you're ready for your (audio) close-up. And, of course, you'll be listed as "Alternate M. Waverly" in the credits of the episode where your voice appears.
*See the FAQ for more details.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Voice A Line As M. Waverly
Online Class: Intro to Robot Puppeteering
Online Workshop: Robot Puppeteering
Episode Credit as "Alternate Waverly"

support.title: RIFF A SHORT WITH JOEL
support.descp:
You've dreamed of it. You've practiced in your living room, with your humorless cat as your audience. Now, it's time to do it.
Join a group of MST3K writers to RIFF A SHORT WITH JOEL for the new season! To make sure you're prepared, you'll join Joel and special guests for an online INTRO TO MOVIE RIFFING class, where you'll learn the finer points of riffing from the pros. Then, it's on to the online GROUP RIFF WORKSHOP, where you'll put your new skills to the test and contribute riff ideas for inclusion in an official MST3K short.
And, when your group's short premieres in The Gizmoplex, you'll be listed as a "Contributing Riffer" in the end credits!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Riff A Short w/ Joel & Team
Online Class: Intro to Movie Riffing
Online Workshop: Group Riff Session
Autographed Script of Your Short
Episode Credit as "Contributing Riffer"

support.title: ADOPT A ROBOT FRIEND
support.descp:
Has it ever crossed your mind that, whether it's on the SOL or in your own home, being trapped in quarantine would be a little more fun with a robot friend of your own?
Well, now you can plan ahead for the next pandemic and GET AN OFFICIAL ROBOT* featured in Season 13 to keep you company through the looming apocalypse!
To make sure you're prepared to care for your new robot friend, you'll also join Joel and special guests for our online INTRO TO ROBOT PUPPETEERING class, where you'll learn puppeteering secrets from the pros who operate our bots on screen.
And, in recognition of your selfless act, you'll be listed as a "Robot Foster Rescue" in the end credits of the episode where your new robot ward appears. Think of it as a pricey Cabbage Patch Kid.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Keep a Crow or Servo from Season 13
Online Class: Intro to Robot Puppeteering
Online Workshop: Robot Puppeteering
Episode Credit as "Robot Foster Rescue"

support.title: EXECUTIVE PRODUCER
support.descp:
Take your place next to Kinga at the top of the ladder and sign on as an EXECUTIVE PRODUCER for the ENTIRE SEASON.*
As soon as the campaign ends, you'll jump online for a PRIVATE VIDEO CHAT with Joel, where he can thank you himself and explain what we have planned. Get used to that, since you'll be entitled to monthly PRIVATE UPDATE CHECK-INS with Joel and the team throughout production.
You'll also get EXECUTIVE ACCESS every step of the way: script drafts, concept sketches, a private virtual set visit, pre-release episode cuts, and much more.
And of course, we'll make sure the world knows your name: You'll be listed as EXECUTIVE PRODUCER in all new episodes, on IMDB, the official poster, and all promo materials.
*You won't be responsible for doing actual work. That wouldn't be much of a reward. See FAQ for more details.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $5000 level, plus...
Executive Producer for Season 13
Private Monthly EP Call with Joel
Exclusive EP Access to Production
Signed Script + Exec Producer Gift
Credit as "Executive Producer" (all eps)

support.title: GIZMOPLEX FOUNDING SPONSOR
support.descp:
Do you love MST3K *and* own a business? Maybe it's time to finally start mixing business and pleasure a little more.
For a select few patrons, we'll immortalize you as a GIZMOPLEX FOUNDING SPONSOR.
What does that mean, you ask?
How about this? We'll produce a CUSTOM PROMOTIONAL VIDEO for your business*, featuring our host and bots, and shot on the Satellite of Love or in The Gizmoplex. Then, we'll feature your new promo video in a FULL YEAR OF GIZMOPLEX EVENTS, so that MST-loving consumers everywhere will know what you did to help their cause.
We'll also create a CUSTOM SPONSOR PLACARD to hang in your business AND we'll place a VIRTUAL PLACARD in The Gizmoplex where guests can see it for years to come.
*See the FAQ for more details before claiming this reward.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $5000 level, plus...
Custom Promo Video from the Cast
Promo Shown At Live Events (12 Months)
Sponsor Recognition in The Gizmoplex
Custom MST3K Sponsor Placard

support.title: FRIEND OF MST3K
support.descp:
Just here to help us boost our final counts? Sent by one of our friends? We don't need a large pledge... we just need YOU!
At this level, you'll still be able to select Add-On Rewards and special "Last Minute Offers" from our friends + cast!
Plus, you'll be able to increase your pledge AFTER the campaign if you want to upgrade to a higher-level reward package!
For more details on our special last-minute offers, check out: http://ks.mst3k.com/friends
INCLUDES:
Weekly Production Updates
Access to "Add-On Rewards"

support.descp:
Just want to be part of the experience? Jump on board and get exclusive WEEKLY UPDATES AND PRODUCTION DIARIES all the way through production of Season 13. You'll also get a digital Gizmoplex Member Kit AND we'll add your name to the virtual walls of The Gizmoplex, in the private Backers' Lounge where Tom Servo tends bar!

Weekly Production Updates
Special Thanks in the Gizmoplex

support.title: PLAY JACKBOX with our CAST!
support.descp:
Want an even MORE interactive video experience? Added as a last-minute offer during our Jackbox Livestream, this reward gives YOU the chance to go head-to-head in a JACKBOX SHOWDOWN with up to four members of our cast.
The human test subject and bots of your choice will face off with you online for 45 minutes, and up to 3 rounds of comic brinksmanship... Plus, we'll give you a copy of Jackbox Party Pack ahead of time so that you can practice for your big match, thanks to our friends at Jackbox Games!
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Play Jackbox w/ MST3K Cast (45 Min)
The Jackbox 7 Party Pack

support.title: BACKSTAGE VIP @ MST3K LIVE
support.descp:
Lord willin’ and the creek don’t rise, MST3K LIVE is heading back on tour late this year (or as soon as the powers that be decide it's safe to congregate in large numbers)*, and we want to offer something special. So...
Grab a friend and meet the tour in New York, Chicago or Los Angeles. You'll enjoy a GROUP DINNER WITH JOEL before the show, then hit the theater in style with 2 VIP TICKETS, a BACKSTAGE TOUR, a GREENROOM MEET-UP and PHOTO OPS with Joel and the cast, and a special VIP TOUR GIFT.
*Exact timing will depend on COVID, but we'll give you 6-8 weeks notice before the show date. See the FAQ for more details.
[SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends.]
INCLUDES:
All rewards in the $500 level, plus...
Pre-Show Group Dinner with Joel
2× VIP Tickets to MST3K LIVE
Backstage Tour, Photo Op, Meet & Greet
2× Special VIP Tour Gift

support.descp:

In addition to VIP access during our Virtual Set Visit, you'll join Joel online each month for a group PRODUCER UPDATE MEETING. We'll send you a signed script and an exclusive producer-level gift. And, of course, to build your street cred, you'll get an ASSOCIATE PRODUCER CREDIT in three new episodes AND on IMDB.
Plus, to help you learn all about our process, you'll also get a free GIZMONIC INSTITUTE CLASSPASS, which gets you into all three of Joel's online lectures, covering Movie Riffing, Robot Puppeteering, and Inventions+Magic. updates.update_userinfo: A New Plan for Updates + Meet the Alternaversal Team!
updates.update_content:
Dear MST3K Preservation League,
Hey everyone, it’s Joel again, and it’s officially summer now! You heard it here first. Now, get out there and have some fun! (And I really mean that: I’m making an assumption that I don’t think you’ve had enough fun yet. Got it? Good.)
Production Update
Things around here at Alternaversal are good and busy.  As you can imagine, we’re still deliriously happy to be working on new episodes of MST3K, and things are seaming together nicely as our plans move ahead.

campaign.story:
Welcome to Norrøngard.
A harsh land beset by marauding trolls, capricious elementals, malevolent spirits, serpentine linnorms, and the greedy undead known as draugar.
Norrøngard is a 5th edition campaign setting drawn from the sagas of Norse mythology and the pages of the novel Frostborn, book one of the Thrones & Bones trilogy.
Life is harsh in the frozen north.... 
“Lou Anders is an absolute master at world building and character, and he’s brought all of that considerable skill to bear on this lavish, exceptional project. The world of Thrones & Bones is the sort of place where legends are born, and I have no doubt people are going to be talking about it in the same breath as DragonLance and Greyhawk in years to come. This is the start of something very special indeed.” — George Mann, former Publishing Manager, Games Workshop and bestselling author
This first volume of the Thrones & Bones Campaign Setting contains approximately 200 pages of lore and mechanics for your 5th edition games. Within this lavishly illustrated tome, players and game masters will find over 60 pages of lore detailing the people, places, and perils of this northern land, as well as new races, subclasses, feats, spells, and magic items. Norrøngard features a mechanic for gaining and losing honor, an original system of rune magic, a bestiary of 29 new monsters (well, 28 monsters and a very cute seal), as well as rules for playing the ball game of Knattleiker, the insult-rhyming competition called Flyting, and the in-world popular board game, Thrones & Bones. Two complete starter adventures kick off your exploration of this fascinating setting.  
Thrones & Bones: Norrøngard is gorgeously illustrated throughout with original artwork from such amazing artists as Andrew Bosley, Justin Gerard, Ksenia Kozhevnikova, Randall Mackey, Will O’Brien, Craig J. Spearing, and Bryan Syme. It features original cartography from Rob Lazzaretti and battle maps from Heroic Maps (available in a Digital Map Pack for VTT or Printing).   
Creator Lou Anders is a Hugo-winning editor, a Chesley-winning art director, and a critically acclaimed author with 25 years experience working in genre entertainment in magazines, television, film, book publishing, and role playing games. In addition to his own novels, Anders has written Star Wars stories for Disney Lucasfilm and has done RPG design for Kobold Press, River Horse Games, and 3D Printed Tabletop.
Editor Misty Bourne provides more than twelve years of publishing experience, having worked on such projects as Mythic Odysseys of Theros (Wizards of the Coast), Underworld Lairs and Tome of Beasts 2 (Kobold Press), and the Epic Legacy series, Total Party Kill series, and Tyrants & Hellions (2CGaming). She edits Hit Point Press’s “Big Bads” (2020 silver ENNIE winner) and is the author of HPP’s Animated Tarot.
Thrones & Bones: Norrøngard presents a world ten years in the making.  Although the Thrones & Bones trilogy is a middle grade series, Thrones & Bones: Norrøngard is not a children's RPG. This first volume in a planned series greatly expands on the lore of the novel, and as such, presents a rich, Norse-inspired realm that stands on its own and which promises hours of adventure for 5th edition fans of all ages. Take the first steps into a world of adventure today. 
The Raven Guard, the Hrafnhird, are a group of 9 elite warriors who protect Norrøngard at the king's command. A special, limited reward tier allows you to help us craft one of these 9 warriors. We'll work with you to determine their name and specific characteristics, then we will use your own likeness, or another you prefer, to create their appearance. Futhermore, your name will appear in the credits of the book. Be a part of Norrøngard history forever! Limited to 9 backers. (Update: This tier has SOLD OUT!)  
The Troll King, Digr Miklimunnr, came to his position by being both the largest forest troll in all of Norrøngard and Ymiria, and the only troll ever reported to have not one or two but three heads. A special, limited reward tier allows you to become one of the Troll King's three heads. We will use your own likeness, or another you prefer, to create the appearance of one of Miklimunnr's heads. Futhermore, your name will appear in the credits of the book. Be a part of Norrøngard history forever! Limited to 3 backers (for obvious reasons). 
In collaboration with Andrew Mills and Mike Sheridan at Alter3dimensya, we're proud to be able to offer the 3D printable Thrones & Bones Board Game Arena as an add-on available to all pledge tiers. This add-on will include files for 3D printing a Thrones & Bones board game with two variant sides. One side will be a faux-wood textured frame with the Thrones & Bones logo, for using the board game as intened (as a board game). The other will be stone stadium seating, for when you want to use the board game in your RPGs as a "life-sized" arena upon which the player characters must fight to the death. Also included are LED torches for adding lights to the corners of the board game when it is used in the arena configuration.  (Note that this add-on is for downloadable .stl files, not physical product, and that the final version may differ slightly from what is pictured here. The retail version of the Thrones & Bones Board Game Arena available after the Kickstarter is expected to cost approximately $35.) 
In collaboration with Heroic Maps, we're proud to offer the Thrones & Bones VTT Map Pack, already included at certain pledge levels. This digital map pack will include all the maps needed to run the two adventures included with the Thrones & Bones: Norrøngard book, offered here at a sizable discount, as the retail version of the Map Pack available after the Kickstarter is expected to cost approximately $75.  
In collaboration with David Joseph Wesley, the Thrones & Bones Original RPG Soundtrack will be 30 to 45 minutes of instrumental music designed to accompany you on your adventures in Norrøngard. For a taste of this Grammy-nominated composer's work, you can listen to his song "Midwinter" here. The Thrones & Bones Original RPG Soundtrack album will be delivered via Bandcamp, available as a high quality download in MP3, FLAC, and more.  
Delivery of digital products
All digital products will be sent to every backer via email through DriveThruRPG.
Delivery of physical products
All physcal products will be sent to every backer through DriveThruRPG.
Shipping costs are not included in any of the listed prices. Because of postal variations and yearly increases in shipping costs, the shipping for print rewards is calculated and charged in the pledge manager after the Kickstarter closes.
Pricing estimates here:
https://support.drivethrurpg.com/hc/en-us/articles/209936893-Estimated-Shipping-Costs-For-Printed-Products
If you'd like a preview of the setting, you can listen right now to Part 1 and Part 2 of "The Aptrgangr's Challenge," an actual play podcast of the first adventure in the book from the good folks at Table Talk. The episode is available on iTunes and Spotify and here is the direct link to their page. More episodes will be posted as they become available.
More information on the Thrones & Bones series, from which the campaign setting originates, can be found here.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is a low risk Kickstarter. To minimize the risk, the entire book has been written, illustrated, and designed prior to the launch. It is with a copyeditor now. In other words, THE PROJECT IS 99.9% DONE. Funding is for recouping the investment that has already been made, and stretch goals are to acquire even more artwork and to bring in other designers to add additional adventures to the setting. In other words, the book is happening. Funding and stretch goals only make it that much more amazing. 

Although it is my first Kickstarter, prior to becoming a full-time author, I worked as an editor and art director in science fiction and fantasy publishing for fifteen years, winning both a Hugo award for editing and a Chesley award for art direction during that time. Before that, I had five years experience working in science fiction and fantasy magazines. I've been a full-time writer since 2014, and I have also written RPG content for Kobold Press, River Horse, and 3D Printed Tabletop. All together, I have over 25 years of experience writing, editing, art directing, and presenting imaginative content. 

Finally, I believe very firmly in seeking the advice of smart people and listening to them. And there's been a lot of that!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi all,
I just wanted to update you with how things are going. We are so far along now, though it's a bit like those hallways in horror movies that stretch out before you the farther you run along them! I'm working full-time on this, and I can see the end but there's still a lot of hurdles to get there. 
The core book, Thrones & Bones: Norrøngard, is currently at 221 pages. All the content is in place, but it will grow a little beyond that because I'm most likely adding an index to the end (as some of you requested). The copyedits were delivered a while ago, and I am slowly updating the text to replace it with the copyedited text. Nearly done with chapter 2 (of 5) there. And I can't stop making monsters. We've got 37 of them in the bestiary now, the most recent additions being the älva (a fairy from Scandinavian folklore), the galtiferð (a ghostly pig of my own invention), and the hyldemoer (a creature from Scandinavian myth that is sort of a cross between an awakened tree, a dryad, and a hag). Of course, all these new monsters need artwork, and the last of that is coming in now through early July, along with a couple additional spot and half page illustrations commissioend just to fill in some gaps. I've joked that this is actually an art book disguised as an RPG manual, and while that's an exaggeration, I think you're all going to be astounded by the amount and quality of the art in this tome. Time-wise, I'm looking to have the book completely in July and send it out for its first test print end of that month or early August (knock on wood).

Hello backers!
Just a quick update to let you all know where things are and fill you in on progress.
Book one, Thrones & Bones: Norrøngard, is nearly done.
Misty Bourne, our wonderful copyeditor, has finished her edits as of yesterday.
I've already laid out the entire book in Affinity Publisher so substituting the copyedited text will be a (relatively) fast and easy undertaking. 95% of the artwork is in and in postion, and the last of the artwork has been commissioned. (What was to be the last of the artwork was already commissioned and delivered, but I just couldn't resist adding . This book has a LOT of art.)

updates.update_userinfo: Thank you + Update (What to Expect When)
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone:
Thank you again for making Thrones & Bones: Norrøngard such a wonderful success. I wanted to give you a quick rundown on how things are going and some idea of what to expect when. 
Copyeditor extraordinaire Misty Bourne has nearly finished work on the core book, Thrones & Bones: Norrøngard, and with that the book will be done except for a few pieces of outstanding artwork and the section on our nine members of the Raven Guard. Initial design work has started on some of which has resulted in the inclusion of MORE MONSTERS in the bestiary. We're now up to 35 monsters (okay, 34 and that aforementioned very cute seal). The is nearly complete with only print-testing of the arena portion remaining. And Grammy-nominated composer David Jospeh Wesley has begun work on the Although this is subject to change, the idea we are working towards is to have a "theme song" followed by music that matches the key settings in all eight of the adventures from the two books.

And that's our Kickstarter.
Wow. 
"554 backers pledged $28,790.10 to help bring this project to life."
Thank you.

We have just 12 hours remaining in the Kickstarter! 
Meanwhile, Table Talk's latest episode is up! The D&D group The Forgotten Ones continue their playtest of the Thrones & Bones: Norrøngard adventures with "Mishap at Ringborg Mine, Part 2." Check it out. And stay up to date on all of their episodes, game system reviews, and 5e homebrew content on the Table Talk Discord server!

Tomorrow is our last day! 
And I'm so thrilled with how far we've come.
Although we've knocked down all the stretch goals, rest assured as the pledges climb I'm thinking about all the additional art I can add to the book, which is just getting bigger and better and better.

Thank you everyone again.
I'm so thrilled with how successful this Kickstarter has been, I can't help myself.
It's not an official stretch goal, but I'm adding two more monsters to the bestiary.
First up will be The Troll King, Digr Miklimunnr, who was always going to get a mention but will now be given a stat block as well. (And only one of his three heads has been spoken for, so there's still time to slap your mug on Ymirian royalty. You know you want to.)

updates.update_userinfo: We did it! Sagas of Norrøngard Hardcover!!!
updates.update_content:
We did it!
Ben McFarland and Sarah Madsen are joining us!
And the Thrones & Bones Adventures: Sagas of Norrøngard hardcover is unlocked and available as a $25 add on.
Also, the VTT Map Pack 2, featuring all the maps needed to run the 6 additional adventures in , is now available as a $20 add on.

updates.update_userinfo: A Thank You Gift: Thianna Frostborn Mini STL Model from Effincool
updates.update_content:
I've got a surprise for you today. And it started life as a surprise for me! 
John Popson of Effincool Miniatures is a dear friend, and I'm a super fan of his company. And just because he is such a fantastic guy, he surprised me with something last week, which he asked me to pass along as a thank you to my wonderful Thrones & Bones: Norrøngard backers!
Thianna Frostborn is the co-protagonist of my Thrones & Bones novels. Born the daughter of a human woman from a far away land and a frost giant from the Ymirian Mountain Range, she was 7 feet tall by the age of 12. Thianna starts out living among the giants, but across the three books, she travels across a large portion of the world of Qualth, and she, um, grows quite a bit as a person. In artwork for the game, as an example of the half-giant player race, I asked illustrator William O'Brien to age her a few years, to be about 16 or 17.

campaign.story:
Slowly slinking through the darkest depths of the Catacombs, this slimy kitty is on the prowl for its new best friend! He's squishy, chonky and super adorable! 
Now you can have your very own Gelatinous Cat, slime free!
I've worked to design and create a prototype of the Gelatinious Cat Plushie. Now that I have it in hand it's even more adorable than I imagined!
If this campaign successfully reaches its funding goal I will be able to begin mass production and deliver this Gelatinous Cat to backers!
I wanted to create something that combined my love for adorable kawaii things with my love for RPGS and tabletop games. So I chose one of the most endearing animals around and merged them with a classic RPG monster. Together they form this adorable Kitty Slime hybrid! 
This little chonker is based on one of my more popular LootCats pin designs. 
With your help we can get this guy into production! This soft kitty is excited to meet his new owner!
PLAY

This Plushie is approximately 7 inches wide x 7 inches long x 6.5 inches tall
It is made with a super soft velvet material
I designed the plushie and it will be manufactured overseas in China.
You can pledge for this project with no risk! This means you can pledge now and edit your pledge later depending on the success of the campaign. You have until the end of the campaign to change or cancel your pledge.
On the ending date of the campaign, you will be charged for your pledge if we reach our funding goal.  Shortly after the campaign ends you will receive a survey to fill out on Backerkit to select your Plushie and pin choices.

About the creator
Hey folks, I'm Keith from Cute Loot Adventures, I am a 3D artist working as a character artist in video games. My passion for games is only surpassed by my love of all things cute and nerdy! I started Cute Loot Adventures originally to make 3d printable minis, but that quickly spread into other areas! Now I'm delving into the mysterious cuddly world of plushies!
Previously I've had two successful campaigns to create LootCats series enamel pins! This will be my first Plushie Kickstarter and I'm excited to bring these plushies to life!
Mew-Holder Plushie - 4000$ CAD - UNLOCKED! 
The first stretch goal is the Mew-Holder plushie! 
It has been UNLOCKED! So it may be selected when pledging for a plushie!
The Mew Holder has already been designed and is currently in the prototype phase. 
Based on another pin design, this all-seeing kitty will direct it's eye beams towards you if it senses you in it's lair! It has only one weakness, laser pointers! 
PLAY

This plush is approximately 9 inches wide x 5 inches long x 8 inches tall (including eye stalks) (Size may change slightly before production)
The plush will be made with a super soft velvet fabric.

Blue Gelatinous Cat - 5500$ CAD - UNLOCKED! 
The Gelatinous Cat is now available in an additional color - BLUE!
Image shown above is a mock up preview. Exact color may vary slightly.

Pink Gelatinous Cat - 7000$ CAD - UNLOCKED! 
The Gelatinous Cat is now available in an additional color - PINK!
Image shown above is a mock up preview. Exact color may vary slightly.

Rewards
For Rewards that include a plushie, you will be able to select your choice of plushie from the unlocked designs.
For Rewards that include a pin, you will be able to select your choice of pins from any individual pin listed in the add-ons section.
Surveys to make your selections will be sent out through Backerkit after the campaign ends.
 Add-Ons 
Add-ons are available for this campaign! You can purchase additional plushies or pins!
1) Press the 'Manage Your Pledge' button above. If you have not pledged yet, it will say, 'Back This Project'.
2) Increase your pledge in the 'Pledge Amount' box by the total of the Add-Ons you want to add.  
 For example if you want an additional plushie (35$) + 2 LootCats Pins (15$ +15$) add an additional 65$CAD to your pledge
 Once the campaign is over you will be able to select your add-ons in the Backerkit survey using the funds you added.
Any funds you add in advance will help us unlock stretch goals!
Add-ons will be also be purchasable through Backerkit shortly after the campaign ends.
 LootCat Series 1 pins and Meowchemists are approximately 1.5 - 2 inches in length
Small Meowchemy pins are approximately .8 to 1 inch in length
Meowchemist Pins are approximately 1.5 inches in length
Vial Pins are approximately .8 inches in length
Bee Potion and Otter Potion, new to this campaign!
Mid February to March: Kickstarter is running
March 11th: Kickstarter ends
End of March: Kickstarter funds are received and Backerkit surveys are sent out.
End of March through April: Additional prototypes are ordered and approved. (Depending on stretch goals achieved)
End of April: Final plushies are ordered from manufacturer and go into production. This can take between 30-60 days depending on quantity
July: Plushies are shipped to me via boat. This can take up to 2 months
August to September: I receive and ship out plushies to backers 
October: Backers begin receiving plushies
I've planned some padding into the estimates above. I listed October as the estimated fulfilment date to cover any possible delays. Ideally we'll get things out a bit sooner than that!
The pledges do not include shipping costs.
To help keep funding numbers precise, shipping will be collected separately.
All shipping fees will be charged and collected after the campaign ends through the Backerkit pledge manager.
Below are shipping estimates to different locations. 
Please note that these are estimates and actual costs of shipping could fluctuate.

1 Plushie
Canada Shipping: 15$ CAD
USA Shipping: 18$ CAD
Everywhere else: 18 -35$ CAD 

2 Plushies
Canada Shipping: 22$ CAD
USA Shipping: 25$ CAD
Everywhere else: 25 -55$ CAD 

Pins Only
Canada Shipping: 5$
USA Shipping: 9$
Everywhere else: 15$

Please note that these estimates do not include tracking,  tracking will be available for an additional fee.
*Customs and Fees*
Please note that there may be customs fees when shipping outside of Canada. These fees are charged by your country and are the responsibility of the backer.
 *UK Backers Important Info*
Due to the new VAT rules in place for the UK, collecting VAT fees and shipping is a little tricky. I don't want to leave anyone out! These kitties would love to have a home in the UK.
Please select the UK Backer Tier. 
Since I cannot collect VAT fees myself, I will reach out to UK backers after the campaign. You will be be able to purchase your LootCats Plushie via a private Etsy link at the end of the campaign. This will be how I collect and remit the VAT's required by your region.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I've already worked with a manufacturer and received the sample plush. So there are very few risks on the manufacturing end. There are always possible delays in manufacturing and shipping that could push back fulfilment.
I will communicate any issues as they come up to backers in regular updates.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: *UK Residents ONLY*
support.descp:
*This tier is exclusively for UK residents*
If you would like to pledge for a plushie or pins, please back this tier.
After the campaign I will reach out to you to know which tier you would like to pledge for.
I will create a private Etsy order for you after the campaign where you will be able to purchase your order.
This is how I will be able to remit all the applicable VAT fees.
Pledge before February 19th to access Early Kitty prices.
The 1$ is a placeholder and is non-refundable
